replies.body:
I hate to admit it but old Quinn wasn't really all that great. She was riddled with bugs and too versatile in gameplay by Riot's standards to bring any unique strengths to the table.

The ability to play as both Quinn and Valor, though, was a fun and exciting feature of her kit that probably could have been refined and executed better if the right changes had been made. It was so significant to her kit and core to her theme that I refuse to believe it won't be coming back some day, one way or another.

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Bot,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gKNILJas,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-14T01:41:43.754+0000)
>
> I hate to admit it but old Quinn wasn't really all that great. She was riddled with bugs and too versatile in gameplay by Riot's standards to bring any unique strengths to the table.
> 
> The ability to play as both Quinn and Valor, though, was a fun and exciting feature of her kit that probably could have been refined and executed better if the right changes had been made. It was so significant to her kit and core to her theme that I refuse to believe it won't be coming back some day, one way or another.

Valor was a champion, an assassin,, but now he is just a taxi. It's funny gibbing an enemy adc with Valor and then skystriking in to KS Valor's kill as Quinn. Quinn steals Valor's kill ftw. lol

I used to main Quinn  before her rework. She was the assassin Adc and my first love. Now she just cant fit anywhere. They removed her blind , they removed her ultimate skills and removed her % missing health burst on R finishing move. Revert Quinn to pre rework please...
